      • giveDmgandMksToOnePlayer

        public static void giveDmgandMksToOnePlayer(Controller currentController,
                                            Player target,
                                            ChosenActions playersChoice,
                                            int numDmg,
                                            int numMks)
        deals a certain amount of damage and marks to a single player
        Parameters:
        currentController - is the current controller
        target - is the single target to hit
        playersChoice - is the choices the player made
        numDmg - is the number of damage to deal
        numMks - is the number of marks to deal

      • giveDmgandMksToPlayers

        public static void giveDmgandMksToPlayers(Controller currentController,
                                          java.util.ArrayList<Player> targetList,
                                          ChosenActions playersChoice,
                                          int numDmg,
                                          int numMks)
        deals the same amount of damage and marks to more than one player
        Parameters:
        currentController - is the current controller
        targetList - is the list of targets to hit
        playersChoice - is the choices the player made
        numDmg - is the number of damage to deal
        numMks - is the number of marks to deal

      • movePlayer

        public static void movePlayer(Controller currentController,
                              Player player,
                              NewCell arrivalCell)
        it moves a player from its current position to an arrival cell sent as a parameter
        Parameters:
        currentController - is the controller of the game
        player - is the player to move
        arrivalCell - is the cell to move the player into

      • canAffordCost

        public static boolean canAffordCost(Player activePlayer,
                                    Ammo availableAmmo,
                                    char[] ammoCost,
                                    boolean pickOrFullReload)
        this method evaluates if a player can pay the cost to grab a GunCard from a SpawnCell
        Parameters:
        activePlayer - is the active player (important to get the powerup cubes)
        availableAmmo - this is the available ammo it has (it could be different from the one in his hand)
        ammoCost - is the ammocost of the item
        pickOrFullReload: - if true it evaluates the cost of picking the item (removes the first cube), otherwise if false it evaluates the full cost (full reload cost)
        Returns:
        if a player can pay the cost

      • visibleTargets

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Player> visibleTargets(Controller currentController,
                                                         FictitiousPlayer playersPOV)
        Parameters:
        currentController - is the controller of the game
        playersPOV - is the player POV from which to calculate the targets
        Returns:
        players you can see (doesn't include yourself)

      • visibleTargets

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Player> visibleTargets(Controller currentController,
                                                         NewCell playersPosition)
        Parameters:
        currentController - is the controller of the game
        playersPosition - is the position from which to calculate the targets
        Returns:
        players you can see (includes yourself)

        Parameters:

        playersPOV - is the player POV from which to calculate the targets
        Returns:

        public static java.util.ArrayList<Player> targetsOneMoveAway(Controller currentController,

        Parameters:
